name: Apocalypse in 3... 2... 1...
description:
WARNING!
This game was made by a designer with basic programming knowledge in 3 hours for Trijam #6. Because of that it's unpolished and buggy. 

Escape from a planet that is going to explode in 5 minutes, while saving as many of its inhabitants as possible.

CONTROLS:
A/D - move left/right
W - pick up objects
S - drop/poke objects
Space - jump
